text: kintu yadi ve tujhapar dabaav daale ki too kisee ko mere saath saajhee thaharae, jisaka tujhe gyaan nahin, to usakee baat na maanana aur duniya mein usake saath bhale tareeke se rahana. kintu anusaran us vyakti ke maarg ka karana jo meree or rujoo ho. phir tum sabako meree hee or palatana hai; phir main tumhen bata doonga jo kuchh tum karate rahe hoge.
